articles.title: Homegrown bank giant bigger than Morgan Stanley to arise from India merger - Business Standard
articles.description: The tieup of HDFC Bank & Housing Development Finance Corp creates a lender that ranks 4th in equity m-cap, behind JPMorgan Chase, Industrial and Commercial Bank of China and Bank of America Corp
